row.name: PRPT.BACKUP.MANUAL
row.description: Prompt pour sélectionner client et emplacement du fichier de backup.

row.xui: <dialog height="424" icon="PRPT" id="PRPTS" left="279" top="4" width="515"><readpanel fill="b" id="PRPTBOX" nl="1" scroll="v" text="PRPT.DB_CHANGE"><properties><entry name="text">PRPT.DB_CHANGE</entry><entry name="modifiable">0</entry></properties></readpanel></dialog>
